newsitem.title: GERMANY: SAP to offer auto sector support.
newsitem.headline: SAP to offer auto sector support.

text.p: German business software group SAP AG said on Tuesday it would add components for car makers and their suppliers to the next release version of its popular R/3 software.
SAP software is made to control the core logistical operations of an enterprise and is used in purchasing, accounting and controlling.

SAP did not provide details about the new components. It said they would be part of a broader trend toward developing sector-specific software solutions for the R/3 environment that would be available next year.
